They follow the route and if any of our riders have major mechanical issues they will get a Pyga to them to finish the stage. Pyga, with the support of Eurosteel, have put together a series of inspirational single track clips called the Pyga Lines of the Old Mutual joBerg2c. This is the first which showcases Harrison Pass on day 6: a 3km single track drop with 32 switchbacks built by Glenn Harrison. description: Ross Sephton The door is always open. The house is safe. Coffee can be on in minutes and the kitchen table can be cleared in a moment - it is a place of peace and non-judgement. Anyone who needs to chat is welcome anytime. Please, never suffer in silence. There is food in the fridge, coffee and tea in the cupboard, wine and whiskey, listening ears, shoulders to cry on and love & thoughts to share.  This is an old value that has been lost to technology. A text, face-time, or emoji is not the equivalent of making time for those we love or care about!  Could at least one friend please copy and re-post (not share)? My mates and I are trying to demonstrate that someone is always listening, you are never really alone
